concept.philosophy: Full cyberpunk dark mode. OrchestKit is a command center that orchestrates AI agents. The UI should feel like mission control: deep black void, neon accent scanlines, particle starfield backgrounds, holographic card surfaces. Every number glows. Every interaction sparks.
distinctive_features: Animated particle/starfield canvas background behind hero
Neon glow borders on all interactive cards (box-shadow with color spread)
Terminal-style stat counters with monospace font and scanline overlay
Electric blue primary, toxic green success, magenta for special/creative
Glassmorphism cards with backdrop-blur over dark void
Staggered fade-in animations on every section
Code blocks styled as embedded terminals with green-on-black
Dot-grid subtle pattern on section backgrounds

glow_blue.role: Neon glow border for active/focus states

glow_green.role: Neon glow border for success states

heading.rationale: Already in use, geometric and modern, excellent for dark UIs

mono.rationale: All stat counters, code blocks, badge values use mono

hero_section.layout: Centered, max-w-4xl, with particle canvas behind. Version badge top, h1 with gradient text, subtitle, two CTAs, then stat bar.

tailwind.wrapper: relative min-h-[80vh] flex items-center justify-center overflow-hidden
tailwind.content: relative z-10 mx-auto max-w-4xl px-6 text-center
tailwind.version_badge: inline-flex items-center gap-2 rounded-full border border-[#1e293b] bg-[#0d1117]/80 px-4 py-1.5 text-xs font-mono text-[#94a3b8] backdrop-blur-sm
tailwind.title: mt-8 text-4xl font-extrabold tracking-tight text-[#e2e8f0] sm:text-5xl lg:text-6xl
tailwind.title_accent: bg-gradient-to-r from-[#3b82f6] via-[#8b5cf6] to-[#d946ef] bg-clip-text text-transparent
tailwind.subtitle: mx-auto mt-6 max-w-lg text-[#94a3b8] sm:text-lg leading-relaxed
tailwind.cta_row: mt-10 flex flex-col items-center gap-4 sm:flex-row sm:justify-center
tailwind.cta_primary: inline-flex h-11 items-center rounded-lg bg-[#3b82f6] px-8 text-sm font-semibold text-white shadow-[0_0_20px_#3b82f640] transition-all hover:bg-[#60a5fa] hover:shadow-[0_0_30px_#3b82f660]
tailwind.cta_secondary: inline-flex h-11 items-center gap-2 rounded-lg border border-[#1e293b] bg-[#0d1117] px-6 text-sm font-mono text-[#94a3b8] transition-all hover:border-[#3b82f640] hover:text-[#e2e8f0]

stat_bar.layout: Horizontal 3-column grid with dividers, monospace numbers, scanline overlay effect

tailwind.grid: mx-auto grid max-w-3xl grid-cols-3 divide-x divide-[#1e293b]
tailwind.label: text-xs font-medium uppercase tracking-wider text-[#64748b]
tailwind.value: mt-1 font-mono text-3xl font-bold tabular-nums text-[#e2e8f0] sm:text-4xl

stat_bar.note: The glow on numbers requires a custom CSS utility since Tailwind does not have text-shadow natively. Define in global.css.

feature_card.layout: Glassmorphism card with neon glow border on hover. Contains icon badge, title, description, arrow link.

tailwind.card: group relative rounded-xl border border-[#1e293b] bg-[#0d1117]/60 p-6 backdrop-blur-md transition-all duration-300 hover:border-[#3b82f640] hover:shadow-[0_0_30px_#3b82f615]
tailwind.icon_badge: mb-4 inline-flex h-10 w-10 items-center justify-center rounded-lg border border-[#1e293b] bg-[#151b23] font-mono text-sm font-bold text-[#3b82f6]
tailwind.title: text-lg font-semibold text-[#e2e8f0]
tailwind.link_arrow: mt-4 inline-flex items-center gap-1 text-sm text-[#3b82f6] opacity-0 transition-all group-hover:opacity-100 group-hover:translate-x-1

navigation.layout: Fixed top bar with backdrop blur, logo left, links center, theme toggle + GitHub right

tailwind.nav: fixed top-0 z-50 w-full border-b border-[#1e293b]/50 bg-[#0a0a0f]/80 backdrop-blur-xl
tailwind.inner: mx-auto flex h-14 max-w-7xl items-center justify-between px-6

tailwind.section_label: px-4 text-xs font-semibold uppercase tracking-wider text-[#64748b]
tailwind.link: flex items-center gap-2 px-4 py-1.5 text-sm text-[#94a3b8] transition-colors hover:bg-[#1c2333] hover:text-[#e2e8f0]

tailwind.base: inline-flex items-center rounded-full px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-medium font-mono

code_block.layout: Terminal-style with title bar (three dots), filename tab, copy button

tailwind.title_bar: flex items-center gap-2 border-b border-[#1e293b] bg-[#0d1117] px-4 py-2.5
tailwind.line_number: inline-block w-8 text-right text-[#64748b40] select-none mr-4

tailwind.trigger: flex h-9 w-64 items-center gap-2 rounded-lg border border-[#1e293b] bg-[#0d1117] px-3 text-sm text-[#64748b] transition-colors hover:border-[#3b82f640]
tailwind.kbd: ml-auto rounded border border-[#1e293b] bg-[#151b23] px-1.5 py-0.5 font-mono text-[10px] text-[#64748b]
tailwind.dialog: rounded-xl border border-[#1e293b] bg-[#0d1117] shadow-[0_0_60px_#3b82f610] backdrop-blur-xl

tailwind.title: text-xs font-semibold uppercase tracking-wider text-[#64748b] mb-3
tailwind.link: block py-1 text-sm text-[#64748b] transition-colors hover:text-[#e2e8f0]

animations.hero_particles: CSS canvas or Three.js starfield, 200 particles, slow drift, white dots with blue tint, parallax on scroll

section_entrance.description: Each section fades up with 80ms stagger delay between children

stat_counter.description: Numbers count up from 0 on viewport entry, monospace font prevents layout shift

animations.reduced_motion: All animations respect prefers-reduced-motion: reduce. Particles stop, counters show final value immediately, glow is static.

hero.mobile: text-4xl, single column CTAs, no particles (performance), min-h-[60vh]

accessibility.reduced_motion: All animations disabled, content visible immediately
accessibility.screen_reader: Stat values have sr-only labels (e.g., '199 Skills')
